longBusinessSummary: Silver Storm Mining Ltd., a mineral resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Mexico. It explores for silver, zinc, copper, lead, and gold deposits. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the La Parrilla Silver Mine Project consists of 41 contiguous mining concessions covering a total of 69,478 hectares located in San Jose de La Parrilla, Durango, Mexico. It also holds a 100% interest in the San Diego property that consists of 4 mining concessions covering an area of 91.65 hectares located in Municipality of Cuencame, Durango State, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Golden Tag Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Silver Storm Mining Ltd. in November 2023. Silver Storm Mining Ltd. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
